method.name: Ceiling
method.summary: Returns the smallest integer value which is greater or equal to the specified floating point number.

method.name: Floor
method.summary: Returns the largest integer value which is lesser or equal to the specified floating point number.

method.name: Max
method.summary: Retrieves the greater of the specified integers.

method.name: Max
method.summary: Retrieves the greater of the specified short integers.

method.name: Max
method.summary: Retrieves the greater of the specified floating point numbers.

method.name: Min
method.summary: Retrieves the lesser of the specified integers.

method.name: Min
method.summary: Retrieves the lesser of the specified short integers.

method.name: Min
method.summary: Retrieves the lesser of the specified floating point numbers.

method.name: Round
method.summary: Rounds the specified floating point value to the nearest integer value.
